Good Comments: The subs were good, and they did pick up where a.f.k. left off, but they didn't translate much of the background text which is one of the funniest parts of the entire show!
half the episode was not subbed at all, and backgrounds were ignored, misspellings everywhere.  Afterwards you think you missed a lot, esp. in a show that is so dependent on every nuance.
Bad Comments: Looks like they're picking up where a.f.k left off! :D Good, clear translations too =)
It would be nice to get a cultural note or two and to translate all of the jokes in the background!
